crag.name: 龍洞

location.addressEn: Longdong Bay, Gongliao District, New Taipei City

crag.description: 龍洞是台灣最具代表性的戶外攀岩場地，位於新北市貢寮區，擁有壯觀的海岸岩壁和多樣化的攀登路線。是台灣規模最大、路線最多的天然岩場。
crag.descriptionEn: Long Dong is Taiwan's most iconic outdoor climbing destination, located in Gongliao District, New Taipei City. It features spectacular coastal cliffs and diverse climbing routes, making it the largest natural crag in Taiwan with the most routes.
crag.liveVideoDescription: 龍洞岩場周邊即時影像，可了解當地天氣與海況

transportation.description: 從台北走國道1號轉台2線濱海公路，約1.5小時車程
transportation.descriptionEn: From Taipei, take National Highway 1 to Provincial Highway 2 (Coastal Highway), about 1.5 hours drive

transportation.description: 從瑞芳火車站搭乘基隆客運至龍洞站
transportation.descriptionEn: Take Keelung Bus from Ruifang Station to Longdong stop
